name: Mercedes-Benz GLE
description: The price of Mercedes-Benz GLE, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 96.65 Lakh - 1.15 Crore. It is available in 2 variants, with engine options ranging from 1993 to 2999 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. GLE has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 9 airbags. Mercedes-Benz GLE has a ground clearance of 215 mm  and is available in 5 colours.

variants.variant_name: GLE 300d 4MATIC LWB 1993 cc, Mild Hybrid (Electric + Diesel), Automatic (TC), 265 bhp
GLE 450d 4MATIC LWB 2999 cc, Diesel, Automatic (TC), 362 bhp
